headline.print_headline: China Looks to Gain by Joining Big U.S.-Led Pacific Naval Drills
headline.main: China Looks to Gain by Joining Big U.S.-Led Pacific Naval Drills

lead_paragraph: A giant U.S.-led naval exercise began off Hawaii on Thursday with China joining its Asia-Pacific rivals for the first time, but analysts doubted the drills will ease tensions over Chinese maritime claims and some said Beijing could use them to strengthen its navy.
